mapper.sql: userId AS userId, payment AS payment, address AS address, phone AS phone, password AS password, nickname AS nickname, name AS name, email AS email
mapper.update:
UPDATE USERINFO SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, PASSWORD = #{password}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone}, PAYMENT = #{payment}
WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert:
SELECT USERID_SEQ.nextval AS userId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO USERINFO (USERID, PAYMENT, ADDRESS, PHONE, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, EMAIL) VALUES (#{userId}, #{payment}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT s.itemid, s.shoppingCategoryId, s.image, s.memo, s.soldQuantity, s.totalQuantity, s.description, s.totalprice, s.price, s.name, o.orderDate FROM ORDERINFO o, SHOPPINGITEM s WHERE o.USERID = #{userId} and o.itemid = s.itemid ORDER BY o.orderDate DESC

SELECT s.itemid, s.shoppingCategoryId, s.image, s.memo, s.soldQuantity, s.totalQuantity, s.description, s.totalprice, s.price, s.name, c.cartId FROM CART c, SHOPPINGITEM s WHERE c.USERID = #{userId} AND c.itemid = s.itemid
SELECT * FROM DELIVERYPOST WHERE USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY writtenDate DESC
SELECT * FROM SELLPOST WHERE USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY writtenDate DESC
